ee1cb8986c0c.description: We write down our mess, that we may marvel in what is same about us, wonder about what is different & embrace one another anyway without condition.
ee1cb8986c0c.name: This Glorious Mess

Colourless flower
that bloomed under the cover of darkness,
I rise to a fear
that grew during…

paragraphs.text: Beautiful poem, Colette. After reading this, I’ve got this picture of a colourless flower just outside the window waiting for me to find it. I can so relate to this mood.

e5a181bc1c16.title: The darkness is an unconventional beauty, it makes the brights brighter.

paragraphs.text: The darkness is an unconventional beauty, it makes the brights brighter. I don’t think I’ve ever seen a wisteria. I googled, beautiful flower. I hope you are well, Precious one. So much love ❤️
paragraphs.name: 5fff

paragraphs.text: Thank you, Jason. I’d like to see a pic of that flower. I struggled to find a pic and ended up editing this one to give it a little gloom. I still think it’s too pretty :)

3cc6b5af6969.title: Colette, no way you are slow.

paragraphs.text: Colette, no way you are slow. The same thing happened to me very recently. Wife told me a dry joke. I took it hook, line, and sinker. She had a serious laugh at my expense. She often does me like that when I’m in a serious mood. :)
paragraphs.name: 1b5d

169222e5796b.name: Heath Houston
169222e5796b.bio: Fractured Poet — I’m just another broken toy. My heart is messy, nearly dead… I don’t care. These are my pieces of the edge… www.instagram.com/heathhouston

ab218430fb42.name: Wild Flower
ab218430fb42.bio: Healing with words. Partially Broken. Adamantly Fixed. Currently travelling the world in search of myself. Journey with me www.instagram.com/wildflowerbanks

36465598035e.bio: I'm not a marshmallow kind of person. I'm more a hard toffee kinda girl. More intense flavour but not everyone has the teeth for me.

264440f3df1b.name: Jackie Ann
264440f3df1b.bio: Passionate writer who enjoys using the creative process as a means of self expression, self reflection, and occasionally self mockery.
